A very good concept to build a game on but i would not consider it of a horror genre. At first it is a bit creepy but after 2-3 matches its just competitive. But its is a really bad game if played alone (that is not with friends). So if you do have friends and you're not a loner then I'd say to go ahead and buy the game.
Overall 7/10

it's fun, and most importantly NOT pay to win. It is very shameful  to have to pay for almost every killer/survivor as DLC, witch wouldn't be a problem unless you have to PAY for a killer/survivor that you will NEVER play, just to grind, admittedly a reasonable amount (5-10 games) of blood points to get a great new perk. This is annoying for me as a killer main, and we get a whole new play style with a new killer. I can't imagine how frustrating it is for survivor mains who LITERALLY have to buy a new skin to get the perks, your only other option: Wait for the perk on shrine... THE PERK... SINGULAR... And they cost "shards" witch as far as i can tell, you get by leveling up... NOW THAT is a bigger grind. And even with ALL THIS, I very much love this game, and keep coming back to it. So it's doing SOMETHING right
Ein mega gutes Spiel nur schade das viele es zu ernst nehmen

Good to have the power to dominate little peasants as killer and really fun to loop and stun killers as a suvivor youll have fun solo but if you play with friends it gets a hundred times more fun. im more of a killer player and thats solo but its still fun because half the players are brain dead and it gives you a sense of power against 4 random kids.
Play this Game with Friends, so You Guys can shit your pants together... : )
